duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Five-Star Customer Service Experience through genuine and friendly interaction with customers via phone, virtual chats, and in person.
Maintain all service vows, meet customer needs, and ensure operational checklist tasks are completed.
Proactively address customer concerns and communicate alteration services and personalization options.
Maintain store standards, process orders, and support cash wrap behaviors.
Respond promptly to customer questions, build long-term relationships, and engage in inventory management procedures.
Report to the Store Manager and partner with the Operations Supervisor/Manager.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent degree OR 1-2 years prior retail experience in an apparel, service, or specialty store environment.
